> これは引用符です。各行の先頭に大なり記号と半角スペース（> ）を置くことで作れます。
>
> たくさんの文章
> -----
> 分割線
>
>> ネストした引用符

> +++ このテーマは通常の記事、単一ページ遷移構文のどちらにも対応しております。
> 通常の記事の場合は
>> {{@@[[include :scp-jp:theme:teito-keizai nomal=[|lang=jp]]@@}}
> 単一ページ遷移構文の一部のページに適用する場合は
>> {{@@[[include :scp-jp:theme:teito-keizai hyper=[|lang=jp|header=[%%content{0}%%|]]@@}}
> としてください。
> {{lang}}引数は他支部でテーマが訳されていないときにlangでISO 3166-1 alpha‑2に従い2文字の国コードを入れることでその支部のinterwikiにすることができます。

[[div_ class="addon"]]
> 広告を使用する際は
>> @@[[include :rtas:user-component:teito-keizai-t |nomal=--]|]]@@
>> @@[[include :rtas:user-component:teito-keizai-b]]@@
> を使用する必要があります。
> この場合はすべてのページに対して同じ広告を載せるものです。
> もし、単一ページ遷移構文を使用している場合に、ページごとに広告の内容を変更させたい場合は
>> @@[[module ListPages limit="@URL|0" range="." urlAttrPrefix="ページ番号"]]@@
>> @@[[include :rtas:user-component:teito-keizai-t |listcss=--]|]]@@
>> @@[[include :rtas:component:cssimage-block@@
>> @@|name=(component:image-blockと同様のため省略)]]@@
>> @@[[include :rtas:user-component:teito-keizai-b]]@@
>> @@[[/module]]@@
> とする必要があります。
> いずれの場合にも、
>> @@[[include :rtas:user-component:teito-keizai-t]]@@
> と
>> @@[[include :rtas:user-component:teito-keizai-b]]@@
> で囲んだ部分が広告となります。

#header h1 {
  margin-left: 50px;
  max-height: 110px;
}
#header h1 a span {
  margin-left: 400px;
}
#header h1 a, #header h2 span {
  font-size: 0;
  font-family: 'Noto Serif JP', serif;
  -webkit-text-stroke: 0.2px #fff;
}
#header h1 span:after {
  border: 2px solid #fff;
  border-radius: 10px;
  content: "電子版";
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  #header {
    background-position: 0px 30px;
    background-size: 250px;
  }
  #header h1, #header h2 {
    margin-left: 0;
  }
  #header h1 a:before {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }
  #header h1 span:after {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  #header h1 a span {
    margin: 0;
  }
  #header h2 {
    position: relative;
    top: -20px;
  }
  #header h2 span:after {
    border: 2px solid #fff;
    border-radius: 10px;
    color: #fff;
    content: "電子版";
    font-size: 1rem;
  }
}

/*============= Custom sidebar ==============*/

#side-bar {
  display: none;
}
#page-content .nav-side>ul, #page-content .nav-side>ul>li {
  display: block;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  list-style: none;
  line-height: normal;
}
#page-content .nav-side>ul>li>ul {
  display: none;
}
#page-content .nav-side .side-link {
  display: none;
}
#page-content .nav-side .menu-fold .foldable-list-container {
  display: none;
}
@supports (position:sticky) or (position:-webkit-sticky) {
  @media (min-width: 768px) {
    #page-content .c-side {
      bottom:0;
      padding-bottom: 3em;
    }
    #page-content .nav-side {
      position: -webkit-sticky;
      position: sticky;
      top: 0;
      overflow-x: hidden;
      overflow-y: auto;
      margin: auto;
      padding: 10px 12px 0 12px;
      height: 100vh;
    }
  }
}
@media (max-width:767px) {
  @supports (pointer-events: none) {
    #page-content .c-side .side-link .close-menu a {
      -webkit-transition:left 0s 0.6s, opacity 0.5s ease-in-out 0.1s;
      -moz-transition: left 0s 0.6s, opacity 0.5s ease-in-out 0.1s;
      transition: left 0s 0.6s, opacity 0.5s ease-in-out 0.1s;
    }
    #page-content .c-side .folded>.side-link .close-menu a {
      pointer-events: none;
    }
  }
  #main-content {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0 0 1em 0;
    max-width: unset;
  }
  #page-content .c-side {
    position: static;
    z-index: auto;
    overflow: visible;
    padding: 0;
    height: auto;
  }
  #page-content .c-side .side-bar {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: -26em;
    z-index: 10;
    display: block;
    float: none;
    clear: none;
    overflow: auto;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 1em 1em 0 1em;
    width: 14.8rem;
    height: 100%;
    border: 0;
    background-color: #3e3e3e;
    -webkit-transition: left 0.5s ease-in-out 0.1s;
    -moz-transition: left 0.5s ease-in-out 0.1s;
    transition: left 0.5s ease-in-out 0.1s;
  }
  #page-content .c-side .side-bar:after {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    width: 0;
    height: 100%;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    content: "";
  }
  #page-content .c-side .side-link {
    position: absolute;
    z-index: 10;
    display: block;
  }
  #page-content .c-side .side-link .open-menu a {
    -webkit-transition: opacity 0.5s ease-in-out 0.1s;
    -moz-transition: opacity 0.5s ease-in-out 0.1s;
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease-in-out 0.1s;
  }
  #page-content .c-side .side-link .close-menu {
    display: inline;
  }
  #page-content .c-side .side-link .close-menu a {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: -100%;
    z-index: -1;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background-color: #000;
    opacity: 0;
  }
  #page-content .c-side .unfolded>.side-bar {
    left: 0;
  }
  #page-content .c-side .unfolded>.side-link .open-menu a {
    opacity: 0;
    pointer-events: none;
  }
  #page-content .c-side .unfolded>.side-link .close-menu a {
    left: 0;
    opacity: 0.3;
    -webkit-transition: left 0s 0.1s, opacity 0.5s ease-in-out 0.1s;
    -moz-transition: left 0s 0.1s, opacity 0.5s ease-in-out 0.1s;
    transition: left 0s 0.1s, opacity 0.5s ease-in-out 0.1s;
  }
  #top-bar .open-menu {
    display: none;
  }
  /* Menu Fold link */
  #page-content .c-side .menu-fold>a {
    visibility: hidden;
  }
  #page-content .c-side .menu-fold .foldable-list-container {
    position: relative;
    display: block;
    height: 0;
  }
  #page-content .c-side .menu-fold .foldable-list-container:before {
    position: relative;
    bottom: -2px;
    visibility: hidden;
    margin-right: 2px;
    width: 13px;
    height: 13px;
    border: 0;
    content: url(http://rtas.wikidot.com//local--files/nav:side/blank.png);
  }
}
#page-content .nav-side>ul, #page-content .nav-side>ul>li {
  display: block;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  list-style: none;
  line-height: normal;
}
#page-content .nav-side>ul>li>ul {
  display: none;
}
#page-content .side-link {
  display: none;
}
#page-content .menu-fold .foldable-list-container {
  display: none;
}
.heading {

.yui-navset * {
  -webkit-transition: background-color 80ms cubic-bezier(.4, 0, .2, 1), color 80ms cubic-bezier(.4, 0, .2, 1);
  transition: background-color 80ms cubic-bezier(.4, 0, .2, 1), color 80ms cubic-bezier(.4, 0, .2, 1);
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav, .yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav {
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: flex;
  -webkit-flex-wrap: wrap;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  margin: 0 auto;
  width: calc(100% - .125rem);
  border: 0;
  box-shadow: 0 .3125rem 0 0 #fff;
  zoom: unset;
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav a, .yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav a {
  border: unset;
  background-color: #333333;
  background-image: none;
  color: #fff;
  zoom: unset;
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav a:focus, .yui-navset .yui-nav a:hover {
  background: none;
  background-color: #c5e1a5;
  color: #484848;
  zoom: unset;
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav li, .yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav li {
  position: relative;
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: flex;
  -webkit-flex-grow: 2;
  flex-grow: 2;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  max-width: 100%;
  border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
  background-color: #333333;
  -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 0 0.0625rem #c5e1a5;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 0.0625rem #c5e1a5;
  zoom: unset;
  -webkit-box-flex: 2;
}
.yui-navset-bottom .yui-nav li a, .yui-navset-top .yui-nav li a, .yui-navset .yui-nav li a {
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: flex;
  -webkit-align-items: center;
  align-items: center;
  -webkit-justify-content: center;
  justify-content: center;
  width: 100%;
  vertical-align: bottom;
  zoom: unset;
  -webkit-box-align: center;
  -webkit-box-pack: center;
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav a em, .yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav a em {
  overflow: hidden;
  padding: .35em .75em;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  white-space: nowrap;
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav li em {
  border: unset !important;
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav .selected, .yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav .selected {
  -webkit-flex-grow: 2;
  flex-grow: 2;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  background-color: #c5e1a5;
  -webkit-box-flex: 2;
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav .selected a, .yui-navset .yui-nav .selected a em {
  border: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav .selected a {
  width: 100%;
  background: #c5e1a5;
  color: #484848 !important;
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav .selected a:active, .yui-navset .yui-nav .selected a:focus {
  background: none;
  background-color: #c5e1a5;
  color: #fff;
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav .selected a:hover {
  background: #c5e1a5;
  cursor: default;
}
.yui-navset .yui-content {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  background-color: #e5e5e5;
  background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 100% 100%, color-stop(.25, #ececec), color-stop(.25, transparent), color-stop(.5, transparent), color-stop(.5, #ececec), color-stop(.75, #ececec), color-stop(.75, transparent), to(transparent));
  -webkit-background-size: 3px 3px;
}
.yui-navset .yui-content, .yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-content {
  border: none;
}
.yui-navset-left .yui-content {
  border: none;
}
.yui-navset .yui-content:after {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: -8px;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 8px;
  background: #c5e1a5;
  color: #333333;
  content: "　･･･";
  vertical-align: top;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: .2em;
  line-height: 8px;
}
/*===========================================*/

/*============ Rate box (Credit) ~===========*/

.rate-box-with-credit-button {
  position: relative;
}
.page-rate-widget-box {
  box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px #111, -1px -1px 3px #555, inset 1px 1px 3px transparent, inset -1px -1px 3px transparent;
}
div.page-rate-widget-box .rate-points {
  border: 1px solid #333333;
  background-color: #333333;
  color: #ffffff;
}
.page-rate-widget-box .rateup, .page-rate-widget-box .ratedown {
  border-top: 1px solid #333333;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #333333;
  background-color: #dddddd;
}
.page-rate-widget-box .rateup a, .page-rate-widget-box .ratedown a {
  color: #333333;
}
.page-rate-widget-box .rateup a:hover, .page-rate-widget-box .ratedown a:hover {
  background: #aaaaaa;
  color: #ffffff;
}
.page-rate-widget-box .cancel {
  border: 1px solid #333333;
  background-color: #333333;
}
.page-rate-widget-box .cancel.btn a {
  color: #ffffff;
}
.creditRate .page-rate-widget-box .cancel a:hover, .page-rate-widget-box .cancel.btn a:hover {
  background: transparent;
  color: #aaaaaa;
}
.rateBox .rate-box-with-credit-button .creditButton {
  border: 1px solid #333333;
  background-color: #333333;
  box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px #111, -1px -1px 3px #555, inset 1px 1px 3px transparent, inset -1px -1px 3px transparent;
}
.rateBox .creditButton a:hover {
  color: #aaaaaa;
}
.creditRate .page-rate-widget-box {
  position: relative;
}
.rateBox .rate-box-with-credit-button .creditButton, .page-rate-widget-box {
  position: relative;
}
.creditRate .page-rate-widget-box, .modalbox .page-rate-widget-box {
  position: relative;
}
#u-credit-view .modalbox {
  box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgb(72 72 72 / 50%);
}
.modalcontainer .modalbox {
  background-color: #dddddd;
}
.modalcontainer .modalbox .modalbox-title {
  color: #dddddd;
}
.modalcontainer .cc-by-sa:before {
  color: #333333;
}
.modalbox div.page-rate-widget-box .rate-points:before {
  z-index: 10;
}
/*===========================================*/

/*===========================================*/

/*============= CONTENT ==================*/

blockquote, div.blockquote {
  border: 1px solid #ddd;
  background-color: #f9f9f9;
  background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 100% 100%, color-stop(.25, #ececec), color-stop(.25, transparent), color-stop(.5, transparent), color-stop(.5, #ececec), color-stop(.75, #ececec), color-stop(.75, transparent), to(transparent));
  -webkit-background-size: 2px 2px;
}
.c-footer {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  max-width: none;
  width: 100%;
  background: #0c0c0c;
  color: #ffffff9c;
  -webkit-transform: translateY(100%);
  transform: translateY(100%);
}
.c-footer .footer-links {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: center;
  margin: 0 10px;
  font-size: 15px;
}
.c-footer .footer-links a {
  flex-grow: 1;
  padding: 5px 10px;
  text-align: center;
}
.c-footer .credit {
  padding-bottom: 30px;
  text-align: center;
}
.c-footer a {
  color: #ddd;
}
/*見出しの変更*/

#page-content h1 {
  color: #333333;
  font-weight: 700;
  font-size: 250%;
  font-family: 'Noto Sans JP', sans-serif;
}
#page-content h2 {
  padding-top: 1em;
  color: #333333;
  letter-spacing: -0.03em;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-weight: 500;
  font-size: 150%;
  font-family: 'Noto Sans JP', sans-serif;
}
/*リンクの色変更*/
a{
  color: #333333;
}
a:active {
  color: #008080;
}
.news {
  padding: 0px 3px 0px 3px;
  width: 50%;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #bfbfbf;
}
@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .news {
    display: block;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    width: 100%;
  }
}
.summary {
  display: -webkit-box;
  overflow: hidden;
  color: #999999;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-line-clamp: 5;
}
.hombun {
  margin: 3%;
  font-size: 150%;
}
/*フッダー部分*/

.bottom-row0 {
  display: flex;
  border: 0.2em solid #333;
  background: #333;
  color: #ffffff;
  text-align: center;
}
.bottom-row1 {
  display: flex;
  border: 0.2em solid #333;
  border-radius: 0 0 5px 5px;
  background: linear-gradient(#333 5%, #444);
  background-color: #333;
  color: #ffffff;
  text-align: center;
}
.bottom-col {
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
  font-size: 60%;
}
@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .bottom-col {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
  }
}
/*===========================================*/

/*===========================================*/

/*================= C-HEDAER ====================*/

.top-row {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  min-height: 130px;
  width: 100%;
  background: #333333;
}
.top-row1 {
  display: flex;
  background: #333;
}
.top-col {
  width: 100%;
}
.c-topbar {
  display: block;
}
.c-mtopbar {
  display: none;
}
@media (max-width: 767px) {
  .c-topbar {
    display: none;
  }
  .c-mtopbar {
    display: block;
  }
}
.category-bar {
  margin: 8%;
  border: 1px solid #333;
  border-radius: 5px;
  background: #333;
  box-shadow: 3px 3px 8px #111, -3px -3px 8px #555, inset 3px 3px 8px transparent, inset -3px -3px 8px transparent;
  color: #ffffff;
  text-align: center;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 95%;
}
.category-bar a {
  display: block;
  margin: 1em 0;
  color: #ffffff;
  text-decoration: none;
}
.scroll {
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  margin: auto;
  width: 95%;
  border-top: 1px solid #444;
  background: #333;
  color: #ffffff;
}
.news-menu {
  display: inline-block;
  padding-left: 100%;
  white-space: nowrap;
  font-size: 12px;
  line-height: 1em;
  animation: scrollAnime 25s linear infinite;
}
.news-menu div {
  display: inline-block;
  margin-right: 10px;
}
@keyframes scrollAnime {
  0% {
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translateX(-150%);
  }
}
.news-menu p {
  font-size: 2em;
  margin-block-start: 0;
  margin-block-end: 0;
}
.news-menu p>span[class^="news"]>span {
  -webkit-text-stroke: 1px #fff;
}
.news-menu p>span[class^="news"]>span>strong {
  -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;
}
.news-menu p>span[class^="news"]>span>span[style="color: lightgreen"] {
  -webkit-text-stroke: 1px lightgreen;
}
.news-menu p>span[class^="news"]>span>span[style="color: coral"] {
  -webkit-text-stroke: 1px coral;
}
[class^="news-num"] {
  display: none;
}
.news-menu.num0 .news-num0 {
  display: inline-block;
}
.news-menu.num1 .news-num1 {
  display: inline-block;
}
.news-menu.num2 .news-num2 {
  display: inline-block;
}
.news-menu.num3 .news-num3 {
  display: inline-block;
}
.news-menu.num4 .news-num4 {
  display: inline-block;
}
.scroll:after {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  z-index: 0;
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
  background-image: linear-gradient(#0a0600 0.6px, transparent 0px), linear-gradient(0, #0a0600 0.6px, transparent 0.6px);
  background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(#0a0600 0.6px, transparent 0px), -webkit-linear-gradient(0, #0a0600 0.6px, transparent 0.6px);
  background-size: 2px 2px;
  content: ' ';
}
@media (max-width: 767px) {
  #page-content .top-row {
    top: -130px;
  }
}
/*===========================================*/

#output .head_link {
  display: block;
  margin-left: 10px;
  box-shadow: -5px 0px #333333, -10px 0px #006e54;
  color: #f5f5f5;
  font-size: 1.5em;
  line-height: 1.5em;
}
#output div[class^="ct-"] a {
  display: block;
  margin: 0.5em 20px;
  color: #fff;
}

#breadcrumbs {
  display: none;
}
.bread-top ul {
  display: inline-block;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  list-style: none;
}
.bread-top > ul > li {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row-reverse;
}
.bread-top > ul > li > a {
  display: none;
}
.bread-top > ul > li > a:first-child:not(:last-child) {
  display: inline;
  color: #333;
  pointer-events: none;
}
.bread-top > ul > li > a:first-child:not(:last-child):hover {
  text-decoration: none;
}
.bread-top > ul ul:after {
  margin-right: 0.25em;
  content: "»";
}
.bread-top > ul ul > li {
  display: inline-block;
}
#page-content .wikisys--template-dialog {
  width: 80%;
}
#page-title {
  display:none;
}
